Description.0: Project: Students will select and profile a natural carbon sequestration measure or a negative emission technology measure for a monetization platform; Measurement, Monitoring, Verification & Reporting.
Description.1: Seminar: Students will present their project and a short viability analysis to the class group.
Description.2: Assignment: A case study of a nature-based solution to tackle the climate and biodiversity crisis and contribute to sustainable development.
Description.3: Group Project: Student groups will devise an implementation plan for a suite of natural carbon sequestration and negative emission technology measures to achieve national GHG emission targets for a selected country.
Description.4: Attendance: Nature-based Solutions for Disaster and Climate Resilience
